text: Zee News is an Indian Hindi- language television channel, that focus on posting News. The channel is owned by Subhash Chandra's Essel Group. It was launched on 27 August 1999 and is the flagship channel of the Zee Media Corporation. The channel has been involved in several controversies and has broadcast fabricated news stories many times. The channel has been subjected to an ongoing criminal defamation case against legislator Mahua Moitra as of March 2020. ==Reference== Category:Television channels in India Category:Indian news websites
title: Zee News
